dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT OD_OB_REG_ID ,OD_SC_REGION ,OD_OB_REG_TYPE ,OD_OB_REG_NO ,OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME ,OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT ,OD_OB_SKU ,OD_PB_ITEM_DESC ,OD_PB_COST_ASSOCIATED ,OD_PB_ENTITY ,OD_OB_REG_DUE_DATE ,OD_OB_REG_STATUS ,OD_OB_REG_DATE ,OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL ,OD_OB_RENEW_YN ,OD_OB_RENEW_FREQUENCY ,OD_PB_DATE_RENEW ,OD_PB_ATTACHMENT FROM q_od_ob_reg_cert_v WHERE NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X') = NVL(:P_REGION,NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_REG_TYPE,'X') = NVL(:P_REGISTRATION_TYPE,NVL(OD_OB_REG_TYPE,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME,NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X') = NVL(:P_SOURCING_AGENT,NVL(OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_ENTITY,'X') = NVL(:P_PAID_BY,NVL(OD_PB_ENTITY,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_REG_STATUS,'X') = NVL(:P_REGISTRATION_STATUS,NVL(OD_OB_REG_STATUS,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_RENEW_YN,'X') = NVL(:P_RENEWAL_NEEDED,NVL(OD_OB_RENEW_YN,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_RENEW_FREQUENCY,'X') = NVL(:P_RENEWAL_FREQUENCY,NVL(OD_OB_RENEW_FREQUENCY,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER,NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X')) ORDER BY od_ob_reg_id asc
